songs.title: Play My Music
songs.album: Camp Rock (Music from the Disney Channel Original Movie)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Turn on that radio
As loud as it can go
Wanna dance until my feet can't feel the ground
Say goodbye to all my fears
One good song and they disappear
And nothing in the world can bring me down

[Pre-Chorus]
Hand Clapping
Hip Shaking
Heart Breaking
There's no faking
What you feel
When you're right at home, yeah

[Chorus]
Music's in my soul
I can hear it
Every day and every night
It's the one thing on my mind
Music's got control
And I'm never letting go
No, no
I just want to play my music
Woo

[Verse 2]
Got my six string on my back
Don't need anything but that
Everything I want is here with me
So forget that fancy car
I don't need to go that far
What's driving me is following my dreams
Yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
Hand Clapping
Hip Shaking
Heart Breaking
There's no faking
What you feel
When you're right at home, yea

[Chorus]
Music's in my soul
I can hear it
Every day and every night
It's the one thing on my mind
Music's got control
And I'm never letting go
No, no
I just want to play my music
I just want to play my music

[Verse 3]
Can't imagine what it'd be like
Without the sounds of all my heroes
Singing all my favorite songs
So I can sing along

[Chorus x2]
Music's in my soul
I can hear it
Every day and every night
It's the one thing on my mind
Music's got control
And I'm never letting go
No, no
I just want to play my music

[Outro]
All night long
